Alternate3.english: "Lieutenant Du Bois, this is Coalition Warship Archer. We are acknowledging and accepting you."
Alternate3.polish: „Poruczniku Du Bois, tu okręt wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Słyszymy cię i akceptujemy połączenie”.
Alternate3.belarusian: «Лейтэнант Дзю Буа, тут вайсковы карабель Кааліцыі «Лучнік». Чуем вас і прымаем злучэнне».

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Aha, excellent! You are connected...."
links.english: "Aha, excellent! You are connected. Now be quick, I don't know how long I'll be able to preserve the signal."
links.polish: „Aha! Doskonale! Jest połączenie. A teraz szybko, nie wiem, jak długo zdołam utrzymać sygnał”.
links.belarusian: "Ага! Выдатна! Ёсць злучэнне. А цяпер хутка, не ведаю, як доўга змагу ўтрымаць сігнал".

links.title: Authority: "This is it... you're finally gettin..."
links.english: This is it... you're finally getting to speak with those who hold *real* power.
links.polish: Nadeszła ta chwila – w końcu porozmawiasz z tymi, którzy mają *prawdziwą* władzę.
links.belarusian: Надарыўся гэты момант – нарэшце пагаворыш з тымі, хто мае *сапраўдную* ўладу.

links.title: Rhetoric: "And by that, they mean the ones wit..."
links.english: And by that, they mean the ones with the guns and the warships...
links.polish: Mają przez to na myśli tych, którym nie brak spluw i okrętów...
links.belarusian: Яны маюць на ўвазе тых, каму не бракуе пісталетаў і караблёў...

links.title: Empathy: "There is so much you wish you could..."
links.english: There is so much you wish you could ask. Your efforts have bought you some time, but you can't forget what you're *really* here for...
links.polish: O tak wiele chciałbyś móc zapytać. Twoje starania zapewniły ci nieco czasu, ale nie możesz zapominać, po co *tak naprawdę* tu jesteś...
links.belarusian: О так шмат хацеў бы ты мець магчымасць спытацца. Твае намаганні забяспечылі табе трохі часу, але ты не можаш забыць, навошта *на самой справе* ты тут...

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Please be advised that you are spe..."
links.english: "Please be advised that you are speaking on the public frequency. What is your request?"
links.polish: „Przypominamy, że nadajesz na ogólnodostępnej częstotliwości. O co chodzi?”
links.belarusian: "Нагадаем вам, што вы вяшчаеце на агульнадаступнай частаце. У чым справа?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been a long winter... Long an..."
links.english: "It's been a long winter... Long and cold."
links.polish: „To była długa zima... Długa i zimna...”
links.belarusian: "Гэта была доўгая зіма... Доўгая і халодная..."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: "A loud sigh comes through the headp..."
links.english: A loud sigh comes through the headphones. "Be advised, officer. The signal is liable to fail any moment now..."
links.polish: W słuchawkach słyszysz głębokie westchnienie. „Uwaga – sygnał może lada moment zaniknąć...”
links.belarusian: У навушніках чуеш глыбокі ўздых. "Увага — сігнал можа ў любы момант знікнуць..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""... Firewalker? Are you there?""
links.english: "... Firewalker? Are you there?"
links.polish: „...Ognisty? Jesteś tam?”
links.belarusian: "...Агністы? Ты там?"

Alternate1.english: "... Officer Sunset? Are you there?"
Alternate1.polish: „...Funkcjonariuszu Sunset? Jesteś tam?”
Alternate1.belarusian: «...Супрацоўнік Sunset? Вы там?»

Alternate3.english: "... Lieutenant Du Bois? Are you there?"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Officer, I've held the signal open..."
links.english: "Officer, I've held the signal open as long as I can. Whatever you came here to ask, ask it now."
links.polish: „Utrzymałam sygnał tak długo, jak się dało. O cokolwiek chciałeś pytać, pytaj teraz”.
links.belarusian: "Утрымлівала сігнал так доўга, як толькі магла. Пра што б ты ні хацеў спытацца, пытай цяпер".

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Is everything alright?""
links.english: "Is everything alright?"
links.polish: „Wszystko w porządku?”
links.belarusian: "Усё добра?"

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte... Er ist unser ei..."
links.english: "Liebling, bitte... Er ist unser einziges Kind..."
links.polish: „Liebling, bitte... Er ist unser einziges Kind...”
links.belarusian: "Liebling, bitte... Er ist unser einziges Kind..."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Time is running short, officer. I..."
links.english: "Time is running short, officer. I estimate you have time for *maybe* two more questions..."
links.polish: „Kończy nam się czas. Oceniam, że wystarczy go jeszcze *może* na dwa pytania...”
links.belarusian: "Час пачынае заканчвацца. Я ацэньваю, што яго хопіць яшчэ *можа быць* на два пытанні..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Come again? We are picking up more..."
links.english: "Come again? We are picking up more interference..."
links.polish: „Możesz powtórzyć? Odbieramy dużo interferencji...”
links.belarusian: "Можаш паўтарыць? Мы атрымліваем шмат перашкод..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been a long winter... Long an..."
links.english: "It's been a long winter... Long and cold."
links.polish: „To była długa zima... Długa i zimna...”
links.belarusian: "Гэта была доўгая зіма... Доўгая і халодная..."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: "A loud sigh comes through the headp..."
links.english: A loud sigh comes through the headphones. "Be advised, officer. The signal is liable to fail any moment now..."
links.polish: W słuchawkach słyszysz głębokie westchnienie. „Uwaga – sygnał może lada moment zaniknąć...”
links.belarusian: У слухаўках чуеш глыбокі ўздых. "Увага – сігнал можа хутка знікнуць..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""... Firewalker? Are you there?""
links.english: "... Firewalker? Are you there?"
links.polish: „...Ognisty? Jesteś tam?”
links.belarusian: "...Агністы? Ты там?"

Alternate1.english: "... Officer Sunset? Are you there?"
Alternate1.polish: „...Funkcjonariuszu Sunset? Jesteś tam?”
Alternate1.belarusian: «...Афіцэр Сансет? Ты там?»

Alternate3.english: "... Lieutenant Du Bois? Are you there?"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""I'm not joking, officer. I'll only..."
links.english: "I'm not joking, officer. I'll only be able to hold the signal open for a few more moments. What you came here to ask, ask it now..."
links.polish: „Ja nie żartuję. Zdołam utrzymać sygnał jeszcze przez najwyżej kilka chwil. O cokolwiek chciałeś pytać, pytaj teraz...”
links.belarusian: "Я не жартую. Магу ўтрымаць сігнал яшчэ максімум некалькі хвілін. Аб чым бы ты ні хацеў пытацца, пытайся зараз..."

links.title: Coalition Warship Archer: ""Is everything alright?""
links.english: "Is everything alright?"
links.polish: „Wszystko w porządku?”
links.belarusian: "Усё ў парадку?"

links.title: Empathy: "There is so much you wish you could..."
links.english: There is so much you wish you could ask, but you probably only have time for one or two questions before the signal is lost...
links.polish: O tak wiele chciałbyś móc zapytać, ale masz pewnie czas na ledwie jedno lub dwa pytania, zanim sygnał przepadnie...
links.belarusian: Ах, так шмат чаго ты хацеў бы спытаць, але, напэўна, часу хопіць толькі на адно або два пытанні, перш чым сігнал знікне...

links.title: Interfacing: "You allow the broken hunk of metal..."
links.english: You allow the broken hunk of metal to clatter to the ground. It wasn't clear to you it did anything anyway...
links.polish: Pozwalasz zniszczonemu kawałowi metalu spaść na ziemię. I tak nie byłeś pewien, czy cokolwiek robił...
links.belarusian: Ты дазваляеш знішчанаму кавалку металу ўпасці на зямлю. І так не быў упэўнены, ці штосьці ён рабіў...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Nein, Liebling!""
links.english: "Nein, Liebling!"
links.polish: „Nein, Liebling!”
links.belarusian: "Nein, Liebling!"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""What are you doing? The connection..."
links.english: "What are you doing? The connection is even worse now! This is extremely unprofessional."
links.polish: „Co robisz? Połączenie jest teraz jeszcze gorsze! To wyjątkowo nieprofesjonalne”.
links.belarusian: "Што ты робіш? Зараз злучэнне яшчэ горшае! Гэта надзвычай непрафесійна".

links.title: You: ""That piece of junk didn't even wor..."
links.english: "That piece of junk didn't even work!"
links.polish: „Ta kawałek złomu nawet nie działał!”
links.belarusian: "Гэты кавалак металалому нават не працаваў!"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""That is because you broke it. Thin..."
links.english: "That is because you broke it. Things stop working when you break them. Or did you not know that?"
links.polish: „Bo go zepsułeś. Rzeczy przestają działać, kiedy się je psuje. Nie wiedziałeś o tym?”
links.belarusian: "Бо ты яго зламаў. Рэчы перастаюць працаваць, калі іх ламаш. Ты гэтага не ведаў?"

links.title: Empathy: "She's right. This was your responsi..."
links.english: She's right. This was your responsibility...
links.polish: Ma rację. To była twoja odpowiedzialność...
links.belarusian: Ён мае рацыю. Гэта была твая адказнасць...

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Damn it! I'm going to push the pow..."
links.english: "Damn it! I'm going to push the power supply. I doubt it will last more than a few minutes, so you'd better make them count."
links.polish: „Cholera! Docisnę mocniej zaopatrzenie w energię. Wątpię, żeby wystarczyło na dłużej niż kilka minut, więc lepiej tego nie zmarnuj”.
links.belarusian: "Чорт! Зашчаплю зарадней забеспячэнне энергіяй. Сумняваюся, што хопіць больш чым на некалькі хвілін, таму лепш не марнуй гэта".

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "A maelstrom of sound, swirling and..."
links.english: A maelstrom of sound, swirling and swirling around an invisible point. It's mounting, mounting...
links.polish: Tornado dźwięku wirującego bez końca wokół niewidzialnego centrum. Coraz wyżej i wyżej...
links.belarusian: Тарнада гуку, што бясконца круціцца вакол нябачнага цэнтра. Усё вышэй і вышэй...

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""... nicht mehr derselbe ist, seit..."
links.english: "... nicht mehr derselbe ist, seit er auf einem Luftschiff aus Graad zurückgekommen ist..."
links.polish: „...nicht mehr derselbe ist, seit er auf einem Luftschiff aus Graad zurückgekommen ist...”
links.belarusian: "... nicht mehr derselbe ist, seit er auf einem Luftschiff aus Graad zurückgekommen ist..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""... Firewalker? Please respond...""
links.english: "... Firewalker? Please respond..."
links.polish: „...Ognisty? Odpowiedz, proszę...”
links.belarusian: "...Агністы? Адкажы, калі ласка..."

Alternate1.english: "... Officer Sunset? Please respond..."
Alternate1.polish: „...Sunset? Odpowiedz, proszę...”
Alternate1.belarusian: «...Закат? Адкажы, калі ласка...»

links.title: Pain Threshold: "It's too much! Your ear drums are t..."
links.english: It's too much! Your ear drums are throbbing, about to burst!
links.polish: To zbyt wiele! Twoje bębenki pulsują, lada chwila pękną!
links.belarusian: Гэта занадта шмат! Твае барабаны пульсуюць, вось-вось лопнуць!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... a long winter... Long and cold..."
links.english: "... a long winter... Long and cold..."
links.polish: „...długa zima... Długa i zimna...”
links.belarusian: "...даўгая зіма... Даўгая і халодная..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "... and then, nothing."
links.english: ... and then, nothing.
links.polish: ...a potem nic.
links.belarusian: ...а потым нічога.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Try it now.""
links.english: "Try it now."
links.polish: „Spróbuj teraz”.
links.belarusian: "Паспрабуй зараз".

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer. This is..."
links.english: "Coalition Warship Archer. This is RCM Officer Firewalker. Please acknowledge."
links.polish: „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Tu funkcjonariusz MOR-u, Ognisty. Potwierdź odbiór”.
links.belarusian: "Вайсковы карабель кааліцыі "Лукнік". Тут супрацоўнік РГМ, Агністы. Пацвердзіць прыём".

Alternate1.english: "Coalition Warship Archer. This is RCM Officer Tequila Sunset. Please acknowledge."
Alternate1.polish: „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Tu funkcjonariusz MOR-u, Tequila Sunset. Potwierdź odbiór”.
Alternate1.belarusian: «Ваенны карабель Кааліцыі Лучнік. Тут афіцэр РГМ, Тэкіла Сансет. Пацвердзіце прыём».

Alternate2.english: "Coalition Warship Archer. This is Detective Costeau of the RCM. Please acknowledge."
Alternate2.polish: „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Tu detektyw Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau z MOR-u. Potwierdź odbiór”.
Alternate2.belarusian: «Вайсковы карабель Кааліцыі Лучнік. Тут дэтэктыў Рафаэль Амбразій Касто з РГМ. Пацвердзіце прыём».

Alternate3.english: "Coalition Warship Archer. This is Lieutenant Harrier Du Bois of the RCM. Please acknowledge."
Alternate3.polish: „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik, tu porucznik Harrier Du Bois z MOR-u. Potwierdź odbiór”.
Alternate3.belarusian: «Вайсковы карабель Кааліцыі «Лучнік», тут лейтэнант Хар'ер Дю Буа з РГМ. Пацярыце прыём».

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Coalition Warship Archer: ""This is... Warship Archer. We are..."
links.english: "This is... Warship Archer. We are acknowledging and accepting you... though we're still getting quite a bit of interference..."
links.polish: „Tu... Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Słyszymy cię i akceptujemy połączenie... chociaż odbieramy sporo interferencji...”
links.belarusian: "Тут... Вайсковы Карамболь Кааліцыі "Лук". Чуем цябе і прымаем злучэнне... хоць вельмі шмат перашкод атрымліваем..."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""This is the best we can do. I sugg..."
links.english: "This is the best we can do. I suggest you get to your business quickly. I doubt I'll be able to maintain even *this* connection very long."
links.polish: „Nic więcej nie zdziałamy. Radzę ci szybko załatwić tę sprawę. Wątpię, żebym nawet *takie* połączenie zdołała utrzymać na długo”.
links.belarusian: "Больш нічога не зможам зрабіць. Раю табе хутка вырашыць гэтае пытанне. Сумняваюся, што нават *такая* сувязь змагу ўтрымаць на доўга".

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry! I was trying to do good.""
links.english: "I'm sorry! I was trying to do good."
links.polish: „Przepraszam! Chciałem zrobić coś dobrego”.
links.belarusian: "Прабачце! Я хацеў зрабіць нешта добрае".

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""But you didn't, you made things wo..."
links.english: "But you didn't, you made things worse."
links.polish: „Ale nie zrobiłeś. Teraz jest jeszcze gorzej”.
links.belarusian: "Але ты гэтага не зрабіў. Цяпер яшчэ горш".

links.title: You: ""It's not *my* fault the statue bro..."
links.english: "It's not *my* fault the statue broke."
links.polish: „To nie *moja* wina, że posąg się sypie”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта не *мая* віна, што статуя развальваецца".

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""But it *is*, because *you* broke i..."
links.english: "But it *is*, because *you* broke it."
links.polish: „Ależ *twoja*, bo to ty go niszczysz”.
links.belarusian: "Але ж *твая*, бо гэта ты яго разбураеш".

links.title: Interfacing: "You allow the broken hunk of metal..."
links.english: You allow the broken hunk of metal to clatter to the ground. It wasn't clear to you it did anything anyway...
links.polish: Pozwalasz zniszczonemu kawałowi metalu spaść na ziemię. I tak nie byłeś pewien, czy cokolwiek robił...
links.belarusian: Вы дазваляеце разбітаму кавалку металу ўпасці на зямлю. І так вы не былі ўпэўненыя, ці што-небудзь рабіў...

links.title: You: ""How do we change the shape of the..."
links.english: "How do we change the shape of the antenna?"
links.polish: „Jak mamy zmienić kształt anteny?”
links.belarusian: "Як мы павінны змяніць форму антэны?"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""What do you mean? You adjust the a..."
links.english: "What do you mean? You adjust the antenna, manually, with your hands."
links.polish: „Nie rozumiem? Zmieniasz kształt anteny ręcznie. Własnymi dłońmi”.
links.belarusian: "Не разумею? Ты змяняеш форму антэны ўручную. Уласнымі рукамі".

links.title: You: ""The connections are pretty dirty,..."
links.english: "The connections are pretty dirty, but I don't have anything to clean them with."
links.polish: „Łączenia są mocno zabrudzone, ale nie mam nic, czym mógłbym je wyczyścić”.
links.belarusian: "Злучэнні моцна забруджаныя, але ў мяне няма нічога, чым я мог бы іх пачысціць."

links.title: You: ""The connections look fine to me.""
links.english: "The connections look fine to me."
links.polish: „Łączenia wyglądają moim zdaniem dobrze”.
links.belarusian: "Злучэнні выглядаюць, на маю думку, добра".

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""I sincerely doubt that's the case,..."
links.english: "I sincerely doubt that's the case, but there's nothing I can do about it from down here. I should've cleaned them beforehand. How foolish..."
links.polish: „Szczerze wątpię, żeby tak było, ale stąd nic na to nie poradzę. Powinnam była oczyścić je wcześniej. Co za bezmyślność...”
links.belarusian: "Шчыра сумняваюся, што так будзе, але адсюль я нічога з гэтым не зраблю. Я павінна была ачысціць іх раней. Якое нядбальства..."

links.title: You: ""Maybe we should try again later?""
links.english: "Maybe we should try again later?"
links.polish: „Może powinniśmy spróbować jeszcze raz później?”
links.belarusian: "Можа, нам варта паспрабаваць яшчэ раз пазней?"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""There won't *be* any later. This i..."
links.english: "There won't *be* any later. This is our chance. Now please, keep going."
links.polish: „Nie będzie żadnego *później*. To nasza szansa. A teraz kontynuuj, proszę”.
links.belarusian: "Не будзе ніякага *потым*. Гэта наш шанец. А цяпер працягвай, калі ласка".

links.title: You: "(Sigh.) "Coalition Warship Archer...."
links.english: (Sigh.) "Coalition Warship Archer. Do you acknowledge? This is Firewalker."
links.polish: (Westchnij). „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Potwierdzacie odbiór? Tu Ognisty”.
links.belarusian: (Уздых). "Вайсковы карабель кааліцыі Луцнік. Пацвярджаеце прыём? Тут Агністы".

Alternate1.english: (Sigh.) "Coalition Warship Archer. Do you acknowledge? This is Tequila Sunset."
Alternate1.polish: (Westchnij). „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Potwierdzacie odbiór? Tu Tequila Sunset”.
Alternate1.belarusian: (Уздыхнуць). «Баявое судно кааліцыі «Лучнік». Пацвярджаеце прыём? Тут «Тэкіла Сансэт».

Alternate2.english: (Sigh.) "Coalition Warship Archer. Do you acknowledge? This is Detective Costeau."
Alternate2.polish: (Westchnij). „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Potwierdzacie odbiór? Tu detektyw Costeau”.
Alternate2.belarusian: (Вздых). „Ваенны карабель Кааліцыі «Лучнік». Пацвярджаеце прыём? Тут дэтэктыў Касто”.

Alternate3.english: (Sigh.) "Coalition Warship Archer. Do you acknowledge? This is Lieutenant Du Bois."
Alternate3.polish: (Westchnij). „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Potwierdzacie odbiór? Tu porucznik Du Bois”.
Alternate3.belarusian: (Уздых). «Карабель Ваеннай Кааліцыі Лучнік. Пацвярджаеце прыём? Тут лейтэнант Дзю Буа».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But someone has been maintaining i..."
links.english: "But someone has been maintaining it. The wiring has been repaired..."
links.polish: „Ale ktoś go serwisował. Okablowanie było naprawiane...”
links.belarusian: "Але нехта яго абслугоўваў. Праводка была адрамантавана..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: "..."
Horseback Antenna: ""... Walker? Please acknowledge.""
links.english: "... Walker? Please acknowledge."
links.polish: „...Ognisty? Potwierdź odbiór”.
links.belarusian: "...Агністы? Пацвердзі прыём".

Alternate1.english: "... Sunset? Please acknowledge."
Alternate1.polish: „...Sunset? Potwierdź odbiór”.
Alternate1.belarusian: «...Sunset? Пацвердзі прыём».

links.title: You: ""Archer! This is Firewalker. Can yo..."
links.english: "Archer! This is Firewalker. Can you hear me?"
links.polish: „Łucznik! Tu Ognisty. Słyszycie mnie?”
links.belarusian: "Лучнік! Тут Вогнены. Чуеце мяне?"

Alternate1.english: "Archer! This is Tequila Sunset. Can you hear me?"
Alternate1.polish: „Łucznik! Tu Tequila Sunset. Słyszycie mnie?”
Alternate1.belarusian: «Лукнік! Тут Tequila Sunset. Вы мяне чуеце?»

Alternate2.english: "Archer! This is Detective Costeau. Can you hear me?"
Alternate2.belarusian: «Лучнік! Гэта дэтэктыў Косто. Вы мяне чуеце?»

Alternate3.english: "Archer! This is Lieutenant Du Bois. Can you hear me?"
Alternate3.polish: „Łucznik! Tu porucznik Du Bois. Słyszycie mnie?”
Alternate3.belarusian: «Лучы! Гэта лейтэнант Дю Буа. Ці чуеце мяне?»

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.english: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind..."
links.polish: „Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind...”
links.belarusian: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind..."

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""... Warship Archer. Please identif..."
links.english: "... Warship Archer. Please identify."
links.polish: „...Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik. Zidentyfikuj się”.
links.belarusian: "...Ваенны Кааліцыі Лучнік. Ідэнтыфікуйце сябе".

links.title: Interfacing: "The signals are getting increasingl..."
links.english: The signals are getting increasingly mixed. Plucking Archer's signal from this will be like isolating a single strand from a tangle of hair.
links.polish: Sygnały mieszają się coraz bardziej. Wyizolowanie sygnału Łucznika będzie niczym wyplątanie pojedynczego włosa z wielkiego kłębu.
links.belarusian: Сігналы ўсё больш і больш перамешваюцца. Вылучэнне сігналу Лукава будзе як выцягванне аднаго валаса з вялікага клубка.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""It's not working." The programmer..."
links.english: "It's not working." The programmer removes her sweat-drenched headphones. "The crosstalk is simply too strong."
links.polish: „To nie działa” – programistka zdejmuje zapocone słuchawki. „Przesłuch jest po prostu zbyt silny”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта не працуе", – праграмістка здымае ўспацелыя навушнікі. "Перашкоды проста занадта моцныя".

links.title: You: ""So what can we do about it?""
links.english: "So what can we do about it?"
links.polish: „I co możemy na to poradzić?”
links.belarusian: "І што мы можам з гэтым зрабіць?"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""What else is there to do? Keep try..."
links.english: "What else is there to do? Keep trying."
links.polish: „Co innego można zrobić? Próbuj dalej”.
links.belarusian: "Што яшчэ можна зрабіць? Спрабуй далей".

links.title: You: ""Wait, what are *you* talking about?""
links.english: "Wait, what are *you* talking about?"
links.polish: „Czekaj, o czym *ty* mówisz?”
links.belarusian: "Чакай, пра што *ты* гаворыш?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's been a long winter... Long an..."
links.english: "It's been a long winter... Long and cold."
links.polish: „To była długa zima... Długa i zimna...”
links.belarusian: "Гэта была доўгая зіма... Доўгая і халодная..."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""It sounds very much like entropone..."
links.english: "It sounds very much like entroponetic crosstalk. It happens sometimes when sending transmissions across long stretches of pale..."
links.polish: „Brzmi to jak entroponetyczny przesłuch. Czasem do niego dochodzi podczas transmisji nadawanych nad dużymi połaciami szaroty”.
links.belarusian: "Гучыць гэта як энтрапанетычны допыт. Часам ён адбываецца падчас трансляцый, якія перадаюцца над вялікімі прасторамі шараты".

links.title: Composure: "Outwardly, she exudes calm, but the..."
links.english: Outwardly, she exudes calm, but there's something disturbing about this thought to her.
links.polish: Z zewnątrz wydaje się spokojna, ale jest dla niej w tej myśli coś niepokojącego.
links.belarusian: Звонку яна здаецца спакойнай, але ў гэтай думцы ёсць нешта трывожнае для яе.

links.title: Logic: "Hold on, isn't the pale supposed to..."
links.english: Hold on, isn't the pale supposed to be thousands of kilometres from here?
links.polish: Chwila, ale czy szarota nie powinna być tysiące kilometrów stąd?
links.belarusian: Момант, але ці не павінна шарыта быць за тысячы кіламетраў адсюль?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Here it is again, this pale... If o..."
links.english: Here it is again, this pale... If only you knew more about it.
links.polish: Znowu ona, szarota... Gdybyś tylko wiedział o niej coś więcej.
links.belarusian: Зноў яна, шаратка... Калі б ты толькі ведаў пра яе крыху больш.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Pale? Pale-pale-pale... Seems to be..."
links.english: Pale? Pale-pale-pale... Seems to be missing from your records.
links.polish: Szarota? Szarota, szarota... Zdaje się, że nie masz o niej nic w kartotece.
links.belarusian: Шаротка? Шаротка, шаротка... Здаецца, што ў картатэцы няма нічога пра яе.

links.title: You: ""I can't understand a word of this..."
links.english: "I can't understand a word of this gibberish."
links.polish: „Nie jestem w stanie zrozumieć z tego bełkotu ani słowa”.
links.belarusian: "Не магу зразумець ні слова з гэтага бязладдзя".

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.english: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."
links.polish: „Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen”.
links.belarusian: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""It isn't gibberish, it's Walder. N..."
links.english: "It isn't gibberish, it's Walder. Now please, keep trying."
links.polish: „To nie bełkot, to walderski. Próbuj dalej, proszę”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта не лухта, гэта вальдэрская. Старайцеся далей, калі ласка".

links.title: You: ""What's going on?""
links.english: "What's going on?"
links.polish: „Co się dzieje?”
links.belarusian: "Што адбываецца?"

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.english: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."
links.polish: „Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen”.
links.belarusian: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""It's crosstalk. In all likelihood..."
links.english: "It's crosstalk. In all likelihood they can't hear you. You have to keep trying until we get a signal through."
links.polish: „To przesłuch. Najprawdopodobniej cię nie słyszą. Będziemy musieli próbować, dopóki nasz sygnał się nie przedrze”.
links.belarusian: "Гэта праслухоўванне. Найхутчэй за ўсё, яны вас не чуюць. Мы павінны спрабаваць, пакуль наш сігнал не праб'ецца".

links.title: You: "Keep listening."
links.english: Keep listening.
links.polish: Słuchaj dalej.
links.belarusian: Слухай далей.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einz..."
links.english: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."
links.polish: „Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen”.
links.belarusian: "Liebling, bitte… Er ist unser einziges Kind. Er kann doch auch nächstes Jahr zur Akademie gehen."

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Keep trying, officer. We'll get a..."
links.english: "Keep trying, officer. We'll get a signal through eventually."
links.polish: „Próbuj dalej. W końcu zdołamy puścić ten sygnał w świat”.
links.belarusian: "Працягвай спрабаваць. Нарэшце мы зможам пусціць гэты сігнал у свет".

links.title: Rhetoric: "You can't make out a word of this g..."
links.english: You can't make out a word of this gibberish.
links.polish: Nie jesteś w stanie zrozumieć z tego bełkotu ani słowa.
links.belarusian: Вы не здольныя зразумець з гэтага блытаніны ані слова.

links.title: Horseback Antenna: ""Nein, Liebling! ... unseren Jungen..."
links.english: "Nein, Liebling! ... unseren Jungen... nach Vredefort ... einem dieser *Dinger*..."
links.polish: „Nein, Liebling! ...unseren Jungen... nach Vredefort ...einem dieser *Dinger*...”
links.belarusian: "Nein, Liebling! ... unseren Jungen... nach Vredefort ... einem dieser *Dinger*..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "I-i-is there anybody th-th-there?"
links.english: I-i-is there anybody th-th-there?
links.polish: J-j-jest tam k-kto?
links.belarusian: Ё-ё-ёсць там н-н-хто?

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.english: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is RCM Officer Tequila Sunset. Please acknowledge."
links.polish: „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik, tu funkcjonariusz MOR-u, Tequila Sunset. Potwierdź odbiór”.
links.belarusian: "Ваенны карабель Кааліцыі "Лукнік", тут супрацоўнік РГМ, Tequila Sunset. Пацвердзіце прыём".

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.english: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is Detective Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau of the RCM. Please acknowledge."
links.polish: „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik, tu detektyw Raphaël Ambrosius Costeau z MOR-u. Potwierdź odbiór”.
links.belarusian: "Вайсковы карабель кааліцыі "Лучнік", кажа дэтэктыў Рафаэль Амброзіус Касто з РГМ. Пацвердзіце прыём".

links.title: You: ""Coalition Warship Archer, this is..."
links.english: "Coalition Warship Archer, this is Lieutenant Harrier du Bois of the RCM. Please acknowledge."
links.polish: „Okręt Wojenny Koalicji Łucznik, tu porucznik Harrier Du Bois z MOR-u. Potwierdź odbiór”.
links.belarusian: "Вайсковы карабель кааліцыі "Лучнік", гэта лейтэнант Хар'ер Дзю Буа з РГМ. Пацвердзіце прыём".

links.title: Shivers: "A soft rustling. Between your ears,..."
links.english: A soft rustling. Between your ears, a winterscape with fast falling snow...
links.polish: Łagodny szmer. Między twoimi uszami rozpościera się krajobraz z padającym śniegiem...
links.belarusian: Лёгкі шолах. Паміж тваімі вушамі разгарнуўся краявід з падаючым снегам...

links.title: You: ""Not yet.""
links.english: "Not yet."
links.polish: „Jeszcze nie”.
links.belarusian: "Яшчэ не".

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Too late. I've begun transmitting...."
links.english: "Too late. I've begun transmitting..."
links.polish: „Za późno. Rozpoczęłam nadawanie...”
links.belarusian: "Занадта позна. Я пачала вяшчанне..."

links.title: You: ""Got it. Are we ready?""
links.english: "Got it. Are we ready?"
links.polish: „Dobra. Jesteśmy gotowi?”
links.belarusian: "Добра. Мы гатовы?"

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""We're ready to try, at least. Plea..."
links.english: "We're ready to try, at least. Please, put those on. I've configured the channels so that only your microphone is set to broadcast. We'll both be able to listen, but anyone we reach will only hear *your* voice."
links.polish: „Gotowi przynajmniej, żeby spróbować. Załóż je, proszę. Skonfigurowałam kanały tak, że tylko twój mikrofon będzie ustawiony na nadawanie. My będziemy mogli słuchać, ale ten, z kim się połączymy, usłyszy tylko *twój* głos”.
links.belarusian: "Гатовыя прынамсі, каб паспрабаваць. Надзень іх, калі ласка. Я настройвала каналы так, што толькі твой мікрафон будзе настроены на перадачу. Мы зможам слухаць, але той, з кім мы злучымся, пачуе толькі *твой* голас".

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""You will need to transmit your con..."
links.english: "You will need to transmit your connection request while I attempt to locate the warship's public frequency. You will likely encounter some interference, but it's important to keep transmitting your request until you're acknowledged. Ready?"
links.polish: „Będziesz musiał przesłać swoją prośbę o połączenie, a ja w tym czasie spróbuję zlokalizować publiczną częstotliwość okrętu. Natkniesz się pewnie na jakieś zakłócenia, ale najważniejsze, żebyś nadawał prośbę, dopóki nie otrzymasz potwierdzenia. Gotowy?”
links.belarusian: "Ты павінен даслаць сваю просьбу на злучэнне, а я ў гэты час паспрабую знайсці публічную частату карабля. Ты, напэўна, сутыкнешся з нейкімі перашкодамі, але галоўнае — каб ты працягваў адпраўляць просьбу, пакуль не атрымаеш пацверджанне. Гатоў?"
